DOC.brief_summary: The objective study determine whether use spontaneous breathe trial allow earlier successful extubation low birth weight ( VLBW ) infant intubate > 48 hour yet successfully extubated ( extubated > 7 day ) .
DOC.brief_title: Extubation Readiness Study Very Low Birthweight Infants
DOC.criteria: Birthweight > 500g < 1500g . Postmenstrual age < 34 week Mechanically ventilate > 48 hour Never successfully extubated Congenital heart disease ( patent ductus arteriosus ( PDA ) , patent foramen ovale ( PFO ) , restrictive ventricular septal defect ( VSD ) Known suspect airway anomaly Severe congenital malformation Need remain intubated reason ( i.e . surgery ) Has meet SBT criterion previous calendar day ( 48 hr ventilation , PIP≤18 , PEEP≤6 , FiO2≤40 % , Rate≤30 , PS≤8 )
